caption:
Humans of HOKA: Philip Speer 

“Running helps me show other people in this business, they can make a change and be successful no matter what. We can recover visibly, loudly even, and we can be okay and continue to live amazing lives helping each other.” — @philipspeer 

In our latest #HumansofHOKA, chef and restaurant owner Philip Speer shares his hard-fought journey to sobriety and the inspiration behind creating @comedorrunclub, an Austin, Texas-based group encouraging healthy habits within the restaurant industry. 

Watch the full film through the link in our profile. 

#FlyHumanFly #HOKA #ShiftthePostShift
